description: Defines the settings for Front Matter page folder
title: Front Matter - page folder

previewPath.description: Defines a custom preview path for the folder.

trailingSlash.description: Specify if you want to add a trailing slash to the preview URL.

filePrefix.description: Defines a prefix for the file name.

contentTypes.description: Defines which content types can be used for the current location. If not defined, all content types will be available.

disableCreation.description: Disable the creation of new content in the folder.

defaultLocale.description: Set the default locale ID for the page folder. All content from this folder is translatable to the languages defined in the `frontMatter.content.i18n` setting.

locales.description: Define the locales for the page folder. This will be used for the translation of the content.
